data.title: Gordo Castillo
data.meta_description: Gordo Castillo was a supporting character in the Power Universe, as a tritagonist in Power Book II: Ghost, being a love interest for Dru Tejada in its third season. He was the son of Frank and Evelyn Castillo, and was an old friend of the Tejada family. Gordo was portrayed by Eric Hernandez. TBA...
data.text:
Gordo Castillo was a supporting character in the Power Universe, as a tritagonist in Power Book II: Ghost, being a love interest for Dru Tejada in its third season. He was the son of Frank and Evelyn Castillo, and was an old friend of the Tejada family. Gordo was portrayed by Eric Hernandez.

Biography

TBA

Goals

Kill Lorenzo Tejada (succeeded)

Keep Dru from finding out about killing Lorenzo (failed)

Protect the Tejada's (succeeded)

Be with Dru Tejada (failed)

Save Cane and Lorenzo from being killed along with Dru (succeeded)

Convince brothers to work with Tejada's (succeeded)

Stay alive (failed)

Murders committed by Gordo

Russian Mob Member: Shot to death to save Lorenzo and Cane.

Lorenzo Tejada: Throat slit for supposedly killing Frank.

Trivia

Gordo is Dru's "play cousin".[1] In Black communities, a "play cousin" is a childhood friend that, although not biologically related, was given the title through the parents' valued relationships, usually with close friends.[2]

Appearances

Power Book II: Ghost, Season 3 #01 "Your Perception, Your Reality" #05 "No More Second Chances" #09 "A Last Gift" #02 "Need vs. Greed" #06 "Land of Lies" #10 "Divided We Stand" #03 "Human Capital" #07 "Deal or No Deal" #04 "The Land of Opportunity" #08 "Sacrifice"
